Course Hero is looking for a Lead Software Engineer - MVC Frameworks. Redwood City. Onsite.

Course Hero is looking for an experienced MVC engineer and architect to join our growing team. Our backend is built with Symfony2, and weâ€™re committed to following and creating the best design patterns for writing sustainable, elegant code in a high-growth environment. Each engineer has the opportunity to touch all parts of the stack, and works closely with product managers and designers to ensure successful results. You'll be: * Expanding our core applications architecture through the use of Symfony and other MVC frameworks. * Leading new product architecture and development * Leading a team in the software design and development process * Taking us global as we scale our site from 10x to 100x as many students who can access our resources for any course, anywhere, at any time. * Serving as a mentor and facilitator in a small Scrum team.

What we can offer you: * Industry competitive salary and stock options. * Full medical coverage (medical, dental, vision). * Retirement plan to help you save for the future. * Regularly planned team events and outings. * Free Friday lunches and an endless snack and drink supply. * On-site amenities including a day spa, full-service cafeteria, 3 miles of nature walks along the Bay and free membership to a 7500 sq. ft. fitness center. More information at: http://www.thesourcery.com/jobs/911
